modules.name: Distinguishable Beetroots
modules.description: Hides the red pixels on the second-to-last growth phase of beetroots, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Carrots
modules.description: Adds flowers to the final growth phase of carrots, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Potatoes
modules.description: Makes the second-to-last growth phase of potatoes more discreet and adds flowers to their final growth phase, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Wheat
modules.description: Makes early growth stategs of wheat greener, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Nether Flux
modules.description: Renames and retextures ancient debris and netherite scrap to nether flux and nether flux ore.
